snippet.title: Adding Building to my Indie Game | Devlog 2
snippet.description:
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Welcome to the second devlog for my pixel art survival sandbox. Recently, I've been adding buildings and furniture to my game, as well as fixing multiple bugs. In this video I show off some of the art I made for the housing, as well as sharing some difficulties I encountered and decisions I had to make along the way. Hope you enjoy! ❤️


🙋‍♂️ Support the channel by subscribing!
https://www.youtube.com/@sigmoiddev

🎬 Watch the rest of the series!
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdCLXFnLGVkAp9dh9vQI5v0Pg78-CMXMy


📖 Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:40 - Thanks
1:04 - Building System & Sprites
2:34 - Rotation and Windows
3:37 - Abstraction
5:02 - Bug Fixes & Storage
5:34 - Questions
7:05 - Outro


🎶 Music:
LAKEY INSPIRED - Warm Nights | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rXYm8YLrZwU
Purrple Cat - Warm Horizon | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uPa-ItyRT6U
LAKEY INSPIRED - Me 2 | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzXl473KgEo
LAKEY INSPIRED - Doing Just Fine | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rft-wpNtt-w


🔗 Credits:
All Gifs from Tenor https://www.tenor.com/
All Icons from https://www.flaticon.com/ from Authors:
Freepik, Ruslan Babkin, Chanut-is-Industries, Kroffle,
KP Arts, Leremy, Ghozi Muhtarom, small.smiles, Flat Icons,
surang, justicon, Hilmy Abiyyu A, RaftelDesign, wanicon,
Hight Quality Icons, Design Circle, Alfredo Hernandez


📱Software:
Recording: OBS Studio 🎥
Editing: CapCut 🎬
Engine: Unity 🕹️
IDE: Visual Studio Code 💻
Theme: Rainglow - Rainbow 🌈
Pixel Art: Aseprite 🖼️
Planning: Milanote 🗒️
